main event: A civilian reported multiple UFO sightings in South Easton, Massachusetts in November 1966.
interesting points: The witness is a 13-year-old who is very interested in UFOs and has researched the topic., The witness described seeing three objects with three reliable people., One sighting involved a white light that turned into a larger red light., The objects were reported to be larger than a star with no sound., There is insufficient data for evaluation according to Project Blue Book.
witness description: a 13-year-old civilian and three reliable people
